metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3154 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The encoder_contexte_ajax function in ecrire/inc/filtres.php in SPIP 2.x before 2.1.19, 3.0.x before 3.0.22, and 3.1.x before 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to conduct PHP object injection attacks and execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted serialized object.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
